talk_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><clr:0000>Woodcutting <clr:ffff>is the practice of chopping
down trees to create logs. <sp:5:0:0>It is how I
spend my days between rests.
talk_28:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughL_00>Such modesty!<sp:0:4:0>Your technique is impressive enough that
I would appreciate your assistance. <sp:5:0:0>That
is assuming you have the time to spare.
talk_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Notice>Ahhh. Have you come to practice your
<clr:0000>woodcutting <clr:ffff>again?
talk_30:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Ah! Excellent technique. <sp:5:0:0>You have clearly
mastered the art of <clr:0000>woodcutting<clr:ffff>.
talk_31:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01><clr:0000>Woodcutting <clr:ffff>is the practice of chopping
down trees to create logs. <sp:5:0:0>Felling that
tree was putting the practice in action.<sp:0:4:0>Logs are useful. They can be <clr:0000>combined<clr:ffff>
to assemble platforms. <sp:5:0:0>You can also chop
them down further to make <clr:0000>wood<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>That is why I come here daily to
chop wood.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>I have some difficulties cutting them down
in the intended direction. <sp:5:0:0>You seem to be
quite skilled at it.<sp:0:4:0>I would appreciate your assistance if you
have the time to spare.
talk_32:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy>Oh my. Where has the time gone? <sp:5:0:0>I did
not even notice the time bell ringing.<sp:0:4:0>It is time I rested for today.
talk_17:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>It is nice to be able to rest when the
time bell rings.<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0>Though the time seems to pass so quickly
as I gaze at the fire.
talk_00: <sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:WorkHeavy_00>Fix your gaze forward. <sp:5:1:0>Face it head on.
talk_19:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Tomorrow I will resume <clr:0000>woodcutting<clr:ffff>.<sp:5:0:0>
I am resting until then.<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0>I will return to work once the morning-
time bell rings.
talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><clr:0000>Woodcutting<clr:ffff> is the practice of chopping
down trees to create logs.<sp:0:4:0>Logs can be <clr:0000>combined<clr:ffff> to assemble
platforms. <sp:5:0:0>You can also chop them down
further to make <clr:0000>wood<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>Lumber has many uses. <sp:5:0:0>That is why I
come here daily to chop wood.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Tired_00>And yet I still find it difficult to chop them
down in the intended direction.<sp:0:4:0>That is why you may have heard me
muttering to myself. <sp:5:0:0>"Fix your gaze
forward. Face it head on."<sp:5:0:0>
talk_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><clr:0000>Woodcutting <clr:ffff>is the practice of chopping
down trees to create logs. <sp:5:0:0>I was engaged
in this practice only moments ago.
talk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Ah. I apologize. <sp:5:0:0>I have been rambling
for some time.<sp:0:4:0>There is an axe I no longer need over
there. <sp:5:0:0>It is yours to use if you want to
do some <clr:0000>woodcutting<clr:ffff>.
talk_21:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughL_00>Such modesty!<sp:0:4:0>Your technique is impressive enough that
I would appreciate your assistance. <sp:5:0:0>That
is assuming you have the time to spare.
talk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy_00>Oh my. Has it grown so late already?<sp:5:0:0>
I must have failed to notice the time bell.<sp:0:4:0>I will rest for today.
talk_22:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01><clr:0000>Woodcutting <clr:ffff>is the practice of chopping
down trees to create logs. <sp:5:0:0>Felling that
tree was putting the practice in action.<sp:0:4:0>Logs are useful. They can be <clr:0000>combined<clr:ffff>
to assemble platforms. <sp:5:0:0>You can also chop
them down further to make <clr:0000>wood<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>That is why I come here daily to
chop wood.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>I have some difficulties cutting them down
in the intended direction. <sp:5:0:0>You seem to be
quite skilled at it.<sp:0:4:0>I would appreciate your assistance if you
have the time to spare.
talk_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice>Hm? <sp:5:1:0>Pardon me. <sp:5:0:0>I was absorbed in
my woodcutting.<sp:0:4:0>Are you here for <clr:0000>woodcutting<clr:ffff> too?
talk_23:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice>Ah. I see you are still here and hard
at work after the night bell.<sp:0:4:0><clr:0000>Woodcutting<clr:ffff> is certainly strenuous. <sp:5:0:0>I am
taking a short rest from it.
talk_40:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Was this your <clr:0000>woodcutting<clr:ffff> at work?<sp:5:0:0>
Very well done.
talk_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Ah. I see. My apologies.<sp:0:4:0>There is an axe I no longer need over
there. <sp:5:0:0>It is available to use if you want
to do some <clr:0000>woodcutting<clr:ffff>.
talk_41:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughL_00>Such modesty!<sp:0:4:0>Your technique is impressive enough that
I would appreciate your assistance. <sp:5:0:0>That
is assuming you have the time to spare.
talk_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Logs can be <clr:0000>combined<clr:ffff> to assemble
platforms. <sp:5:0:0>You can also chop them down
further to make <clr:0000>wood<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Tired_00>I admit to finding it difficult to chop trees
down in the intended direction.<sp:0:4:0>Our creators gave me useful advice in this
regard. <sp:5:1:0>"Fix your gaze forward. Face the
tree head on."<sp:0:4:0>Perhaps you will find this advice useful
in your own woodcutting.
talk_42:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01><clr:0000>Woodcutting <clr:ffff>is the practice of chopping
down trees to create logs. <sp:5:0:0>Felling that
tree was putting the practice in action.<sp:0:4:0>Logs are useful. They can be <clr:0000>combined<clr:ffff>
to assemble platforms. <sp:5:0:0>You can also chop
them down further to make <clr:0000>wood<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>That is why I come here daily to
chop wood.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>I have some difficulties cutting them down
in the intended direction. <sp:5:0:0>You seem to be
quite skilled at it.<sp:0:4:0>I would appreciate your assistance if you
have the time to spare.
talk_27:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I witnessed your <clr:0000>woodcutting <clr:ffff>technique
just now. <sp:5:0:0>It was very well done.
